name: Imp
resistances: Cold; Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.description: Magical Darkness doesn't impede the imp's Darkvision.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Invisibility
traits.description: The imp turns Invisible until it attacks, it casts a spell, it uses its Sting, or its Concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). Equipment the imp wears or carries is also Invisible.

actions.name: Sting (Bite in Beast Form)
actions.description: *Melee:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 5 (1d4 + 3) Piercing plus 10 (3d6) Poison damage.
